RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIMPLY STATED was away alertly to vie for the lead between rivals, made a bid to shake clear on the turn two wide, then drew clear leaving the turn and remained clear to prove, driving. EUPHIMA (ARG) vied for the early on the inside, shifted off the rail on the turn, stalked the pace three wide off the turn and kept on to be clearly second best. AMEN SYLVIA was reserved early, saved ground on the turn and had a belated rally on the inside. SUGAR SMILE was allowed to settle and lacked a rally. POSITIVE FORCE pressed the pace three wide and weakened. BEA BEA KAZ stalked the pace two to three wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Smile
ENTRY.OWNER: Pewter Stable and Sardello Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Euphima (ARG)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of SI

ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, shifted out turn, came 3 wide, kept on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Amen Sylvia
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, saved ground turn, belatedly inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Bea Bea Kaz
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2-3 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Positive Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Simply Stated
ENTRY.OWNER: W M T Stable and Sylmar Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied between horses, bid, drew clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lb s. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile Seventy Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRATT was settled early, advanced three wide on the backstretch, made a three wide move on the turn, then had a long drive and prevailed late to prove best, driving. ADY'S MUNNY set a pressured pace along the inside, shook clear on the turn, then had a long drive with the winner and missed. SAMARONTI pressed the pace two wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Ady's Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, shook clear turn, long drive, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Samaronti
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Pratt
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 3 wide 1/2, bid 3 wide, long drive, prevailed, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entere d For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at Five Furlong s.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAB THE GOLD stalked the early pace three wide, made a four wide bid off the turn to vie for command by the furlong marker, then slowly edged clear after a long drive to prevail. CASH IN A FLASH showed good speed and set the pace two wide, then came out under left handed crop leaving the turn, then dueled for command on the inside by the furlong marker but was out-kicked late after a long drive. BRIT'S CANDYMAN showed good speed early on the inside, then relented and rated back, made a three wide bid between rivals leaving the turn, then was shut off nearing the three sixteenths, angled out for racing room and closed well but too late. GONE INZANE chased the pace three wide on the turn, angled out nearing the furlong marker but had no kick. STANHOPE chased the pace towards the inside but lacked the needed stretch bid. LUCKYTOBEINAMERICA was settled early, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. The rider on BRIT'S CANDYMAN claimed foul against THE RIDER ON CASH IN A FLASH for interference leaving the turn, after the STEWARDS reviewed the replay the OBJECTION was not allowed and the race left as is.

ENTRY.NAME: Brit's Candyman
ENTRY.OWNER: Kenwood Racing LLC and Paterpop Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, rated back, bid between upper, shut off 3/16,rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Stanhope
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, needed stretch bid

ENTRY.NAME: Luckytobeinamerica
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 5 wide upper stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Gone Inzane
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, angled out, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cash in a Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2 wide, pace turn, came out 3/16, long drive, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Grab the Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 4 wide, long drive, edged clear, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 8. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Ente red For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NICK THE CARDSHARK shifted out and bumped A T M AWESOME leaving the five eighths marker, tracked the pace three wide, made a four wide bid leaving the quarter pole, drew clear in the furlong grounds to prove much the best, driving. CARGO SHIP set the pace while clear, two wide on the turn, then was headed by the furlong marker and proved to be no match for that rival while second best. BEYOND THE BEND tracked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn but flattened out the final furlong. FEDERAL CASE was allowed to settle early and then had no serious rally. A T M AWESOME was bumped and checked leaving the five eighths marker, chased the pace three wide and weakened. PURPLE SHIRT was reserved early, three wide on the turn and was n not a threat. The rider on A T M AWESOME claimed FOUL against the rider of the winner NICK THE CARDSHARK for interference around the five eighths marker, after the STEWARDS reviewed the replay the OBJECTION WAS ALLOWED and the winner NICK THE CARDSHARK was disqualified and placed fifth.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Nick the Cardshark
ENTRY.COMMENT: shift out 5/8, bumped rival, 4 wide move, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Federal Case
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Purple Shirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 3 wide turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Cargo Ship
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace, 2 wide turn, headed 1/8, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: A T M Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, checked 5/8, chased 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond the Bend
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4-3 wide, bid 3 wide, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 8 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PATTY'S BOY was settled early on the inside, advanced up the inside on the turn, then cut the corner leaving the turn to take over, then drew off under a vigorous drive. HOLD THE IRISH tracked the early on the inside, shifted off the inside and advanced five wide by the quarter pole, then was along for the place award while no match to the winner. SAILOR SPEED was four wide into the first turn, vied for the lead on the outside, made a three wide bid on the turn to shake clear, but weakened in the drive, bested rest. VISHNU vied for the lead between rivals and four wide, dropped back on the turn and was four wide by the quarter pole and weakened. ARISTOCAT vied for the early lead in between rivals three wide, made a two wide bid entering the far turn but weakened. DANGNABBIT vied for the lead on the inside and weakened. ITGOT GRANDMA tracked the early pace three wide, dropped back on the backstretch and was wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Hold the Irish
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, shift out, 5 wide 1/4 pole, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Dangnabbit
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Itgot Grandma
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, wide backstretch, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Aristocat
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead between horses, bid 2 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Patty's Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, saved ground turn, inside bid, drew off, handily,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Flint W. Stites & Robert M. Bouse

ENTRY.NAME: Vishnu
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead between horses, 4 wide 1/4 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sailor Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, vied outside, bid 3 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UPTOWN SERAPHINA dueled for the lead two wide and made a two wide bid off the turn and gained a short lead by the furlong masrker and then maintained a short lead to the wire to prove best, driving. SHE'S A LINO dueled for the lead on the inside and fought gamely to the wire to be clearly second best. TRECHMO GIRL hopped at the start, settled back early, then had a belated rally on the inside to best the rest. MISS MIA LIA was reserved early, four wide on the turn, came five wide into the lane and improved late. TRAJEC HOLIDAY was reserved early on the inside and lacked a rally. FAIR AND TRUE was reserved early and was not a threat. KILLDRESS KAY stalked the early pace three wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Trajec Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Albright George R and Hughes Alfred A
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Fair and True
ENTRY.OWNER: Ioia Joseph Ioia Gayle and Spina Chuck
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Trechmo Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, settled back, inside turn, belatedly inside,

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Lino
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, fought gamely to wire, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Seraphina
ENTRY.OWNER: Strunk John L Strunk Theresa A Baxter Ted R and Baxter Susan G
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, bid 2 wide, edged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Killdress Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mia Lia
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 4 wide turn, improved late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 8. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLOWER'S FORTUNE was away alertly to set the pace while dawdling along, then was challenged nearing the quarter pole by LOVE IS STRONG but turned back that bid to shake clear to prove best under a drive. LOVE IS STRONG tracked the winner early, made a two wide bid nearing the quarter pole and loomed boldly off the turn but was out-kicked in the final furlong, second best. MIKEY'S JEWEL was allowed to settle early, entered the far turn and made a mild three wide bid on the turn but flattened out, bested rest. DANCE A LITTLE JIG was reserved early, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. MANI PEDI was rated early, made a inside middle move but tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance a Little Jig
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Mikey's Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mild bid 3 wide 1/4, flattened out,bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Mani Pedi
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated, middle move inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Love Is Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, flattened out, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Flower's Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, dawdled along, repelled bid, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 8. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNINGFORHOME was reserved early while three to four wide, advanced on the turn five wide, closed full of run to get up in time to prove best, driving. C C'S WARRIOR prompted the pace and made a two wide bid on the turn to draw clear, then widened the margin by the furlong marker but was caught late, second best. ABUELO NUNO was four wide into the first turn, chased the pace four wide, made a three wide bid nearing the quarter pole but weakened in the drive, bested rest. DIGGERS DIAMOND passed the tiring rivals. INNUENDO broke outwardly at the start, five wide into the first turn, settled early and was four wide on the far turn and had no rally. SPIN CYCLE tracked the pace on the inside and tired. OUCH OUCH OUCH set a pressured pace on the inside and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Diggers Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Ouch Ouch Ouch
ENTRY.OWNER: Mr Ree Stable and Matthew Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Runningforhome
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 4 wide turn, closed full of run, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, drew out 1/8, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Spin Cycle
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Abuelo Nuno
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, chased 4 wide, bid 3 wide, weakened, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Innuendo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly,5 wide first turn,settle, 4 wide turn, no rally,
